enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Adoption of the Agenda: Noting that consultations had taken place on this matter, SBSTA Chair Thorgeirsson invited delegates to adopt the agenda, including amended items on 'issues related to cleaner or less greenhouse gas-emitting energy' and on 'issues related to the implementation of Protocol Article 2.3.
' He said the SBSTA may refer components of the latter item to the SBI, but it will not appear on the SBI agenda.
